pages.text: $(tool)Mining Speed$() increases the speed at which you break blocks with your tool.$(br2)Each level provides a $(important)25% speed boost$(), making your mining and harvesting significantly faster!

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(5DADE2)Diamond$() grants $(tool)Mining Speed +2$()$(br2)Create rough jewels with diamond at the Jewel Creation Station, then polish them at the Polish Station.

pages.title: Effect Scaling
pages.text: $(li)Level 1: +25% speed$(li)Level 2: +50% speed (Diamond)$(li)Level 3: +75% speed$(li)Level 4: +100% speed (2x faster!)$(br2)Stack multiple jewels to reach incredible mining speeds!

pages.title: Works On
pages.text: $(li)Pickaxes - Mine stone faster$(li)Axes - Chop wood faster$(li)Shovels - Dig dirt faster$(li)Hoes - Till soil faster$(br2)$(o)Perfect for strip mining or building projects!$()
